sections.title: Introduction & Role Context
sections.goal: Establish participant backgrounds, clarify their connection to Nimbus Observability and initial responsibilities.
sample_questions: Can you outline your role in the Nimbus Observability project and your primary responsibilities?
How does your day-to-day work intersect with the stated scope of OpenTelemetry pipelines and SLOs?
What were the initial objectives you were given when joining this phase of the project?

sections.title: Architecture & Pipelines
sections.goal: Understand the technical architecture, data flow, and integration points for observability pipelines.
sample_questions: Walk me through the current OpenTelemetry pipeline setup from ingestion to storage.
How are trace sampling strategies (e.g., RFC-1114) implemented and validated?
Which other projects or systems does Nimbus Observability integrate with for metrics and logging?

sections.title: SLO Definition & Enforcement
sections.goal: Explore how service level objectives are defined, monitored, and enforced within the project.
sample_questions: What process do you follow to define SLOs for new services monitored by Nimbus?
How do you ensure alignment with company-wide SLAs, like SLA-HEL-01 or SLA-ORI-02?
Can you describe a recent incident where SLO breaches triggered automated workflows?

sections.title: Incident Analytics & Response
sections.goal: Dive into how incident data is analyzed, triaged, and fed back into improvements.
sample_questions: How does the team use incident analytics to reduce alert fatigue (per RB-OBS-033)?
Can you share an example where analytics revealed a cross-service dependency issue?
What heuristics or unwritten rules guide your prioritization during multi-service incidents?

sections.title: UX Considerations in Observability
sections.goal: Understand UX design choices for observability dashboards and alerting interfaces.
sample_questions: How are accessibility and usability requirements incorporated into observability tooling?
Can you describe how the design system influences incident dashboard layouts?
What feedback loops exist between SREs and UX for improving incident visualization?

sections.title: Cross-Project Dependencies
sections.goal: Identify and analyze dependencies between Nimbus and other Novereon projects.
sample_questions: Which dependencies on projects like Helios Datalake or Orion Edge Gateway impact observability?
How do you manage schema or API changes that affect telemetry data ingestion?
What coordination mechanisms exist between your team and dependent projects?

sections.title: Tradeoffs, Risks, and Evidence-Based Decisions
sections.goal: Discuss major decisions, their tradeoffs, associated risks, and the evidence used to support them.
sample_questions: What was a high-impact decision you made regarding sampling rates, and what evidence supported it?
How do you balance detailed telemetry data against cost budgets (POL-FIN-007)?
Can you walk me through a decision log or ticket that illustrates a tough tradeoff?

sections.title: Closing & Lessons Learned
sections.goal: Summarize key insights, lessons learned, and advice for future observability projects.
sample_questions: What are the top three lessons learned from building Nimbus Observability so far?
If you could change one architectural choice, what would it be and why?
What advice would you give to a new SRE joining this project tomorrow?
